name: unsaturated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
food & drink Unsaturated fat or oil is either monounsaturated or polyunsaturated, found in plants, vegetable oil, and fish, and thought to be better for your health than saturated fat.
containing less of a substance than can be absorbed, and therefore not in a state of balance
used to describe a hydrocarbon in which the carbon atoms do not join as many hydrogen atoms as possible

chemistry containing less of a substance than can be absorbed, and therefore not in a state of balance
